scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test LOGLEVEL=error DRACHTIO_PORT=9060 FREESWITCH_PORT=8022 REDIS_PORT=16379 node test/ | ./node_modules/.bin/tap-spec
scripts.coverage: NODE_ENV=test DRACHTIO_PORT=9060 FREESWITCH_PORT=8022 REDIS_PORT=16379 ./node_modules/.bin/nyc --reporter html --report-dir ./coverage npm run test
